metadata.title: CVE-2017-16669 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: coders/wpg.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file, related to theAcquireCacheNexus function in magick/pixel_cache.c.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
